section.name: User Folders
section.description: User folders that are used in the system are stored here.

setting.name: Illustrations Library Path
setting.description: Path to the local user illustrations library.

setting.name: Fonts Library Path
setting.description: Path to the local user fonts library.

setting.name: Scripts Library Path
setting.description: Path to the local user scripts library. This contains scripts for project text processing.

section.name: Project Folders
section.description: Any folder name that is, or could be, used in a project needs to be stored here.

setting.name: Project Parent Folder
setting.description: The parent folder this project is located in.

setting.name: Project Configuration Folder
setting.description: The project configuration folder where all configuration files are kept.

setting.name: Project Components Folder
setting.description: The folder were project components are kept.

setting.name: Project Deliverables Folder
setting.description: The folder were project deliverable (rendered) items are kept.

setting.name: Project Scripts Folder
setting.description: The folder where all the project custom processing scripts are kept.

setting.name: Project Helper Scripts Folder
setting.description: The folder where all the project helper scripts are kept.

setting.name: Project Macros Folder
setting.description: The folder where all macros, or scripts, that drive the rendering process are kept.

setting.name: Project Fonts Folder
setting.description: The folder where all the fonts for a project are kept.

setting.name: Project Hyphenation Folder
setting.description: The folder where hyphenation information files are kept.

setting.name: Project Illustrations Folder
setting.description: The folder where project illustration files are kept.

section.name: Rapuma Folders
section.description: Any folder name that is, or could be, shared between system modules needs to be stored here.

setting.name: Rapuma Configuration Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma configuration folder where all the XML default configuration files are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Resource Folder
setting.description: The rapuma resource folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Component Type Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma component type folder where component resources are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Documentation Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma document docs folder where Rapuma documentation is kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Fonts Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma resource fonts folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Macros Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma resource macros folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Scripts Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma resource scripts folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Styles Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma resource styles folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Examples Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma resource examples folder where various Rapuma project examples are kept.

setting.name: Rapuma Illustrations Folder
setting.description: The Rapuma resource illustrations folder where various Rapuma system resources are kept.
